evidence.claim: HRABC mentions a collaboration platform that adheres to HIPAA regulations.
The organization emphasizes compliance with health data standards such as FHIR and HIPAA.
Platforms used by HRABC suggest integration patterns that align with EHR systems, though specifics are not detailed.
No specific cloud services or technical APIs related to data platforms have been found on the HRABC website.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transactional activities or API automation for healthcare data exchange.
